intro: Kohleria martensii, commonly known as the red-tipped kohleria, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers. The plant features striking red bracts that surround small, tubular flowers, typically in shades of pink or white. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and requires well-draining soil. Kohleria martensii is often cultivated as a decorative houseplant due to its ornamental value.
